availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Kentucky. Married to Francis Walden Prather in Mercer County on June 29, 1857. Father of Bettie Prather and George Prather. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 110.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 31.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191863.
Find A Grave, "Thomas H. Prather (1836-February 20, 1907)," Memorial #15088788, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15088788 (accessed March 13, 2017).
